titles.title: Supporting Child Care Providers and Families Affected by Coronavirus Act
Supporting Child Care Providers and Families Affected by Coronavirus Act
A bill to provide supplemental appropriations for the Child Care and Development Block Grant program, and the Head Start and Early Head Start programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: Supporting Child Care Providers and Families Affected by Coronavirus Act This bill provides FY2020 supplemental appropriations for states to provide child care services and administer Head Start programs.
